Product Title: A Man Called Peter
Review Date: 2016/10/10
Store: Richard Todd  (Actor),     Jean Peters  (Actor),     Henry Koster  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
Product Description: ['Richard Todd, Jean Peters. The rousing and inspirational story of the Scottish-born minister Peter Marshall who became the Chaplain of the U.S. Senate. 1955/color/117 min/NR/widescreen.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '2.55:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.56 x 5.2 x 7.61 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '889918', 'Director': 'Henry Koster', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 59 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 6, 2005', 'Actors': 'Richard Todd, Jean Peters, Marjorie Rambeau, Jill Esmond, Les Tremayne', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish', 'Language': 'Unqualified, French (Stereo), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), Spanish (Stereo)', 'Studio': '20th Century Studios', 'Writers': 'Catherine Marshall, Eleanore Griffin', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: So happy to have this in my DVD collection!  A great movie. This movie came out when I was a young girl and had forgotten just how wonderful it was and how it effected my life then, even at such a young age and now at this age, also. Reminding me in a strong way of how faith in God can grow and bring joy back into this old woman's heart.
Review Title: So happy to have this in my DVD collection
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Didn't give 5 stars only because some situations I feel needed a little more details and finishing out some of them.  Just my own opinion others may think it is fine the way it is.

profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Media Preferences**: The user continues to appreciate films with strong narratives and informative content, particularly those that explore serious themes. Their recent interactions indicate a nostalgic connection to inspiring stories that resonate emotionally, particularly those reflecting personal faith and growth.

- **Rating Tendencies**: Consistently rating films around 4 stars, the user demonstrates a commitment to quality storytelling. They occasionally award higher ratings when a film’s emotional impact is profound, as seen in their recent positive reflection on a childhood favorite.

- **Emotional Engagement**: While deeply engaged with character arcs and narrative depth, the user shows a growing expectation for films to evoke emotional responses and effectively sustain audiences' investment throughout.

- **Educational Value**: The user maintains a focus on films that illuminate social issues and provoke thought, illustrating a discerning eye for storytelling that conveys meaningful messages.

- **Subject Matter Interest**: A sustained interest in biographical adaptations and narratives of personal struggles persists, enhanced by a deeper appreciation for storytelling quality and execution.

- **Constructive Critique**: The user offers balanced feedback, acknowledging both strengths and weaknesses in storytelling. Their increasing sensitivity to narrative flaws highlights a shift toward seeking more authentic engagements, particularly with themes centered on faith and personal growth.

Overall, the user prioritizes meaningful cinema that intertwines educational value, emotional resonance, and quality storytelling, reflecting a desire for films that enrich their understanding and experience.
